q: Since his return, in October, Ben Roethlisberger has tried to be a better teammate and a better person. Like the Eagles' Michael Vick , he has been contrite and has said all the right things. It would be amazing to win another Super Bowl, but it won't be like I'll say,` Do you forgive me now?' It'll just be another step in earning back everything I lost, he told the Pittsburgh Post-Gazette's Ron Cook last week. But given Eric Schmidt 's success, the board clearly wants to retain his guidance for the next four years. Eric Schmidt , 55, is being replaced as Google's chief executive by cofounder Larry Page .
